item.description:
The Tap Brewpub is your number one destination in Haverhill for great, made from scratch food and great, made from scratch beer. A longstanding staple of downtown Haverhill, the Tap serves as a melting pot of great personality, service, and company with a craft brewery's taste in beer and a five star chef's taste in food. Not only do we provide a fantastic meal and drink, but we also spotlight local bands in our Limelight Lounge, and offer pool and beerball in our Playpen bar. Three floors of fun for all, The Tap is a welcome, fun experience, so if you haven't been before, it's worth it to come down and give us a look. If you have been, we appreciate your patronage, and look forward to seeing you again soon!

 

The Meetup phone number is: 978.304.2811 take a minute now and put it in your phone, that way if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, you already have it to call, please note this phone does not accept text messages.

Is it time for you to pay your dues?  Please look at your profile page where it states “Membership dues last recorded by your Organizer” You can pay your dues at any event.  Thank you in advance for paying your dues!

Snow may cancel this event please remember to check back to see if we are still going to this event.

As a courtesy to everyone in the group come back to the event page and change your RSVP if your plans change or call me/send a message through the site.

Looking forward to seeing you,

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be upstairs, come on in and meet us up there.
item.name: Dancing to Don't Call Me Shirley.... at The Tap
